name: whatson-api
description: What's on? API to retrieve movies and tvshows

scripts.update-packages: ncu -u --reject express && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.changed-dataset: git update-index --no-assume-unchanged src/assets/films_ids.txt && git update-index --no-assume-unchanged src/assets/series_ids.txt
scripts.unchanged-dataset: git update-index --assume-unchanged src/assets/films_ids.txt && git update-index --assume-unchanged src/assets/series_ids.txt
scripts.check-dataset: bash src/data/checkIds.sh check_dataset movie $HEAD_NUMBER $EXCLUDED_IDS_MOVIE && bash src/data/checkIds.sh check_dataset tvshow $HEAD_NUMBER $EXCLUDED_IDS_TVSHOW
scripts.check-local-with-remote-ids: node src/data/updateData.js movie no_update_ids update_db local no_active check 0 no_force skip_mojo skip_services && node src/data/updateData.js tvshow no_update_ids update_db local no_active check 0 no_force skip_mojo skip_services
scripts.update-local: npm run update-local-movie && npm run update-local-tvshow
scripts.update-local-stop-movie: bash src/data/getIds.sh local movie stop imdb
scripts.update-local-stop-tvshow: bash src/data/getIds.sh local tvshow stop imdb
scripts.update-local-stop: npm run update-local-stop-movie && npm run update-local-stop-tvshow
scripts.update-dataset: bash src/data/checkIds.sh check movie && bash src/data/checkIds.sh check tvshow
scripts.update-active-dataset: bash src/data/checkIds.sh check movie active && bash src/data/checkIds.sh check tvshow active
scripts.confirm-dataset: bash src/data/checkIds.sh update movie && bash src/data/checkIds.sh update tvshow
scripts.pull-all-platforms: git pull origin main && git pull bitbucket main && git pull bitbucket_2 main && git pull bitbucket_3 main
scripts.push-all-platforms: git push origin main && git push bitbucket main && git push bitbucket_2 main && git push bitbucket_3 main
scripts.push: npm run changed-dataset && npm run check-api-version && npm run prettier && npm run test && npm run commit && npm run push-all-platforms && npm run unchanged-dataset
scripts.push-dataset: npm run changed-dataset && npm run prettier && npm run test && git add . && git commit -m 'build: update dataset' && npm run push-all-platforms && npm run unchanged-dataset
scripts.push-without-tests: npm run check-api-version && npm run prettier && npm run commit && npm run push-all-platforms && npm run unchanged-dataset
scripts.push-without-version: npm run prettier && npm run test && npm run commit && npm run push-all-platforms && npm run unchanged-dataset
scripts.update-movie-data-first-half: node -e "const { getDateValue } = require('./src/utils/getDateValue'); console.log(getDateValue(true));" | xargs -I {} node src/data/updateData.js movie no_update_ids update_db circleci no_active no_check_db_ids {} no_force mojo check_services no_delete 7
scripts.update-movie-data-second-half: node -e "const { getDateValue } = require('./src/utils/getDateValue'); console.log(getDateValue(false));" | xargs -I {} node src/data/updateData.js movie no_update_ids update_db circleci no_active no_check_db_ids {} no_force mojo check_services no_delete 7
scripts.update-tvshow-data-all: node -e "const { getDateValue } = require('./src/utils/getDateValue'); console.log(getDateValue(true));" | xargs -I {} node src/data/updateData.js tvshow no_update_ids update_db circleci no_active no_check_db_ids {} no_force mojo check_services no_delete 7
scripts.check-ids-before-update-all-ids: npm run update-local && npm run update-active-dataset && npm run confirm-dataset && npm run update-all-ids
scripts.check-ids-before-update-all-ids-force: npm run update-local && npm run update-active-dataset && npm run confirm-dataset && npm run update-all-ids-force
scripts.check-ids-and-stop-before-update-all-ids: npm run update-local-stop && npm run update-active-dataset && npm run confirm-dataset && npm run update-all-ids
npm run update-local-stop && npm run update-active-dataset && npm run confirm-dataset && npm run update-all-ids-force
scripts.update-all-ids-movie: node src/data/updateData.js movie update_ids update_db local active no_check_db_ids 0
scripts.update-all-ids-tvshow: node src/data/updateData.js tvshow update_ids update_db local active no_check_db_ids 0
scripts.update-all-ids: npm run update-all-ids-movie && npm run update-all-ids-tvshow && npm run test
scripts.update-all-ids-force-movie: node src/data/updateData.js movie update_ids update_db local active no_check_db_ids 0 force
scripts.update-all-ids-force-tvshow: node src/data/updateData.js tvshow update_ids update_db local active no_check_db_ids 0 force
scripts.update-all-ids-force: npm run update-all-ids-force-movie && npm run update-all-ids-force-tvshow && npm run test
scripts.update-all-active-ids-movie: node src/data/updateData.js movie no_update_ids update_db local active no_check_db_ids 0 force
scripts.update-all-active-ids-tvshow: node src/data/updateData.js tvshow no_update_ids update_db local active no_check_db_ids 0 force
scripts.update-all-active-ids: npm run update-all-active-ids-movie && npm run update-all-active-ids-tvshow && npm run test
scripts.update-all-non-active-ids-movie: node src/data/updateData.js movie no_update_ids update_db local no_active no_check_db_ids $INDEX force mojo no_skip_services no_delete_ids $DAYS_NUMBER $MAX_INDEX
scripts.update-all-non-active-ids-tvshow: node src/data/updateData.js tvshow no_update_ids update_db local no_active no_check_db_ids $INDEX force mojo no_skip_services no_delete_ids $DAYS_NUMBER $MAX_INDEX
scripts.update-all-non-active-ids: npm run update-all-non-active-ids-movie && npm run update-all-non-active-ids-tvshow && npm run test

author: Pierre Vanoverschelde
